---
name: MXL RC Meeting - Requirement
about: Covers a potential Requirement to be discussed in the RC meeting
title: "[REQ] "
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

A clear and concise description of the requirement in the form of: As a [ROLE], I want [What it is], So that I, ...
